text: Cellular Solids • Engineering cellular solids – Honeycombs: 2D prismatic cells – Foams: 3D polyhedral cells – Applications: sandwich panels, energy absorption, insulation • Cellular materials in medicine – Trabecular bone, osteoporosis – Tissue engineering scaffolds; cell-scaffold mechanics • Cellular materials in nature – Honeycomb-like: wood, cork – Foam-like: trabecular bone, plant parenchyma, sponges – Cellular/solid structural components in nature • Sandwich panels (leaves, skulls) • Radial density gradients (palm stems, bamboo) • Cylindrical shells with compliant cores (plant stems, animal quills, toucan beak) 3
